name: Solitude (Britrinity)
description:
Solitude is a very short interactive story about a subject sadly near to me, Depression.

I don't claim to know an extensive amount about the subject of depression, but what I do know is personal experience, something which may not help everyone or anyone but I wanted to create this nonetheless.

This is the first game I have worked on in many years so any input would be vastly appreciated and if even a single person comes away with positive thoughts about this game I will consider it an absolute success.
